page.title: 15Children's Games,Doncaster.
page.content: {BULLDOG}A good place to play is on a tennis court. The most number of people that can play is 8. One person is "on" and the idea of the game is that the other players have to get from one line of the tennis court to the other without the person who is "on" ticking them with his hand. If the person ticks you then you're "on" as well until the last one gets ticked. Then the game is finished. For the next game, if you were ticked first you're on. {KIRBY}You pick a road to play on which has a kerb at each side. You need two players and a ball, and the idea of the game is to throw the ball from your kerb to your opponent's kerb. If you hit the kerb you get a point, but if it hits and comes back and you catch it you get two points. If you don't hit the kerb you get no points.
